text: The Parliament of Northern Ireland was the home rule legislature of Northern Ireland, created under the Government of Ireland Act 1920, which sat from 7 June 1921 to 30 March 1972. It was suspended because of The Troubles. ==Other websites== *UK Election Results site â€“ Intro to the NI Parliament Category:1921 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century establishments in Northern Ireland Category:1972 disestablishments
title: Parliament of Northern Ireland
